projects.title: Budget Planner
projects.description: MyMoney is a simple offline expense tracker with budgeting, multiple accounts, and charts. It has a homescreen widget for quick expense logging. The Pro version adds themes, more icons, and passcode protection.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: It is my simple portfolio. You are seeing this in my portfolio. My Portfolio is my online presence for anybody to connect, know and contact me.
